column1: of the prosecutor and the mistaken view of fact by the trial Court.

column2: Another complaint, connected to the same issue, presented before us

column1: by  the  Appellant was  that  the  tar  like  substance  has  not been  explained
through  the  expert  while  an  attempt  was  made  through  Rangajeewa
explain  the  transformation  in  appearance  of  the  substance  detected.  The
evidence of the witness reveals that he too received specialised  training in
the  detection  and  identification of the  dangerous  drugs  including heroin.
